person.persName: William B. Mattingly (Marion County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Basil Mattingly and Mary "Polly" Hagan Mattingly. Married to Elizabeth Beaven Mattingly. Farmer in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned six enslaved persons in Marion County in 1850. Farmer in Marion County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Marion County in 1860. Household owned an additional eight enslaved persons in Marion County in 1860.
